title: NASA and the'space navigator'
subtitle: The legend of the space race says that NASA spent millions of dollars developing an "space pilot pen" operating in outer space, while the Soviets solved the same problem using pencils.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: NASA spent millions of dollars on developing a "space pilot pen" operating in outer space, while the Soviets fixed the problem at a much lower and faster price using pencils.
